meanings.definition: Not feeling or showing embarrassment or shame
meanings.sent1: She walked into the room with an unblushing smile, unaffected by the curious stares around her.
meanings.sent2: The unblushing student confidently presented her project to the class without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: Despite the embarrassing mix-up, he remained unblushing and continued with his speech.
meanings.sent4: Her unblushing demeanor in the face of criticism was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unblushing way she handled the awkward situation left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: Shameless or bold in behavior or attitude
meanings.sent1: His unblushing disregard for the rules often landed him in trouble.
meanings.sent2: The unblushing politician made outrageous claims without any evidence to support them.
meanings.sent3: The unblushing way he asked for a raise shocked his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: Her unblushing confidence on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unblushing manner in which he flirted with danger worried his friends.
